content: I don't have any personal preferences. however, escovitch fish is a classic and popular jamaican dish that many people love, so it might be a good one to try first. it's a combination of crispy fried snapper topped with a spicy and tangy pickled vegetable sauce, usually made with carrots, onion, bell peppers, and vinegar. the flavors are bold and vibrant, and it's a great way to experience the spicy and acidic flavors that are typical of caribbean cuisine.
